INFO

This problem statement is shared by Sharp Economy - one of the technology partner for HackIndia 2025.

üèÜ Work on this problem statement if you want to compete in the $25,000 Prize Pool.

Project: LLM-Powered Form Filler ‚Äã

Difficulty: Intermediate

Problem ‚Äã

Upload any PDF form and auto-fill using LLM from user profile data.

Bonus: Supports KYC, tax, visa forms.

üõ†Ô∏è Starter Repos ‚Äã

  • PDF-GPT
  • unstructured.io

üì¶ Models ‚Äã

  • GPT-3.5 / Claude
  • PaddleOCR for PDF text extraction

üîé Data Sources ‚Äã

  • Sample forms: income tax, Aadhaar, etc.
